channel.title: Comments on: Poetry Spam
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I'm not sure what to make of it. Something about time growing short.
item.content:encoded: I’m not sure what to make of it. Something about time growing short.

item.title: By: Monica
item.dc:creator: Monica
item.description: http://tolkien.cro.net/talesong/doing.htmlTo fly would be folly, to stay would be jolly...Didn't you say you wanted to stay in Rivendale? And what do you make of the message you are gettin?
item.content:encoded: http://tolkien.cro.net/talesong/doing.htmlTo fly would be folly, to stay would be jolly…Didn’t you say you wanted to stay in Rivendale? And what do you make of the message you are gettin?
